    "name": "Generated by a sieve.",
    "comment": [
        "Apply the sieve of A003309, but begin with 3 rather than 2."
    ],
    "reference": [
        "N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence)."
    ],

        "<a href=\"/index/Si#sieve\">Index entries for sequences generated by sieves</a>"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "t = Range[3, 330]; r = {}; While[Length[t] >0, k = First[t]; AppendTo[r, k]; t = Drop[t, {1, -1, k}];]r (* _Ray Chandler_, Dec 02 2004 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(Haskell)",
        "a003310 n = a003310_list !! (n-1)",
        "a003310_list = f [3..] where",
        "   f (x:xs) = x : f (g xs) where",
        "     g zs = us ++ g vs where (us, _:vs) = splitAt (x - 1) zs",
        "-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 12 2014"
    ],
    "xref": [
